trans-unit.source: The input is not a valid Base-64 string as it contains a non-base 64 character, more than two padding characters, or an illegal character among the padding characters.
trans-unit.target: 輸入不是有效的BASE64字符串，因為它包含非BASE64允許的字符，兩個以上的填充字符或填充字符中含有非法字符。
